DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Aricept in nursing home patients with severe Alzheimer's disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Aricept in Patients With Severe Alzheimer's Disease Who Are Living in Skilled Nursing Homes
DOC.criteria: Probable or possible Alzheimer's disease Living in skilled nursing home Other types of dementia or psychiatric or neurologic disorders Musculoskeletal disease
